<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Specialized Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3453) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 78

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443)

</column>

---

You've trained your mammoth or other megafauna companion to perform in unusual or extreme situations, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind. Your megafauna gains your choice of the [bully](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?Specialized=true&ID=2), [racer](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?Specialized=true&ID=4), [tracker](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?Specialized=true&ID=5), or [wrecker](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?Specialized=true&ID=6) specialization.

**Special** You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, add a different specialization of the ones listed above to your megafauna companion. Your megafauna can't have more than three specializations.
name: Specialized Megafauna Companion
